title: Analyze Post-Event Network Performance
description: After a major sporting event, an agent needs to analyze network performance in the stadium's area to plan for future events.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical performance data (e.g., user count, data throughput, congestion) for the cell sectors covering the stadium during the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the relevant historical data.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify peak usage times and any performance bottlenecks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that data throughput was maxed out for 2 hours.

tasks.description: Generate a report recommending capacity upgrades or the deployment of a temporary cell-on-wheels (COW) for the next event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report with actionable recommendations.
